title: 100 Ways To Die - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Horror   Mystery   Shounen Ai   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Monsters   Revenge   Spirits
author: Round Moon Cake   圆月饼
description:
Shopkeeper’s copywriter: I don’t know where I came from, but I take all kinds of cases, especially supernatural cases.

Can you hear the mermaid singing?

Can you see the miniature dwarf?

Have you ever eaten a witch’s apple?

They all live around us, doing things we don’t know. They live off of their obssession, and eventually they give in to it.

I thought my life is like that too, but then I realized I’m not like them, because I love him.>
